  <div id="content">
    <div class="marginator">
                  <div class="columns main-columns">
        <h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Reading and Writing of the Honors Thesis</h1>                        <div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">
                                                  <div class="clear-block"> 
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>EAST 1930 S07 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 12665]</span></h3>


  	Prior admission to honors candidacy required. Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
					<dt>Course Attributes</dt>
						<dd>First Half of Year Course</dd>
			
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Dore+J+Levy">Dore J Levy</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

 </div>
                     </div>
        <!-- end .second-column -->

  <div id="content">
    <div class="marginator">
                  <div class="columns main-columns">
        <h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Reading and Writing of the Honors Thesis</h1>                        <div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">
                                                  <div class="clear-block"> 
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>EAST 1930 S08 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 12666]</span></h3>


  	Prior admission to honors candidacy required. Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
					<dt>Course Attributes</dt>
						<dd>First Half of Year Course</dd>
			
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=James+L+McClain">James L McClain</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

 </div>
                     </div>
        <!-- end .second-column -->

<li class="leaf last menu-alumninewsletters"><a href="http://www.brown.edu/academics/east-asian-studies/about/alumni-newsletters/alumni-newsletters" title="">Alumni Newsletters</a></li>
</ul></div>
			
				
	</div>


	
	<div id="helpful-links" class="clear-block block block-menu ">
	
	<h5>Helpful Links</h5>	
		<div class="content"><ul class="menu"><li class="leaf first menu-easvideolibrary"><a href="/academics/east-asian-studies/eas-video-library/eas-video-library" title="The East Asian Studies Department has over 200 videos and DVDs in Chinese, Japanese and Korean. ">EAS Video Library</a></li>

  <!-- Layout -->
  
  <div id="content">
    <div class="marginator">
                  <div class="columns main-columns">
        <h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Reading and Writing of the Honors Thesis</h1>                        <div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">
                                                  <div class="clear-block"> 
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>EAST 1930 S09 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 12667]</span></h3>


  	Prior admission to honors candidacy required. Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
					<dt>Course Attributes</dt>
						<dd>First Half of Year Course</dd>
			
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Cynthia+J+Brokaw">Cynthia J Brokaw</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

 </div>
                     </div>
        <!-- end .second-column -->

  <!-- Layout -->
  
  <div id="content">
    <div class="marginator">
                  <div class="columns main-columns">
        <h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Reading and Writing of the Honors Thesis</h1>                        <div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">
                                                  <div class="clear-block"> 
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>EAST 1930 S10 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 12668]</span></h3>


  	Prior admission to honors candidacy required. Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
					<dt>Course Attributes</dt>
						<dd>First Half of Year Course</dd>
			
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Louis+Putterman">Louis Putterman</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

 </div>
                     </div>
        <!-- end .second-column -->

  </div>

  <!-- Layout -->
  
  <div id="content">
    <div class="marginator">
                  <div class="columns main-columns">
        <h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Reading and Writing of the Honors Thesis</h1>                        <div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">
                                                  <div class="clear-block"> 
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>EAST 1930 S11 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 12669]</span></h3>


  	Prior admission to honors candidacy required. Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
					<dt>Course Attributes</dt>
						<dd>First Half of Year Course</dd>
			
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Tamara+Chin">Tamara Chin</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

 </div>
                     </div>
        <!-- end .second-column -->

		<div class="content"><div class="view view-contact-information view-id-contact_information view-display-id-block_1 view-dom-id-1">
    
  
  
      <div class="view-content">
        <div class="views-row views-row-1 views-row-odd views-row-first views-row-last">
    <div class="vcard">
	<div class="adr">

		</div>
			<div class="post-office-box">Box 1850</div>
		<span class="locality">Providence</span>, <abbr class="region" title="Rhode Island">RI</abbr> <span class="postal-code">02912</span>
	</div>
	<div class="tel"><span class="type">Phone</span> <span class="value">401 863 2778</span></div>
	<div class="tel"><span class="type">Fax</span> <span class="value">401 863 2659</span></div>
	<div><a class="email" href="mailto:EAS@brown.edu">EAS@brown.edu</a></div>
</div>
  </div>
    </div>
  
  
  
  
  
  
</div> </div>
			
				
	</div>

              </div>

        <section id="banner" class="marginator sub-banner" style="background-image:url(/academics/east-asian-studies/sites/brown.edu.academics.east-asian-studies/files/ursa_minor_simple_banner_image.jpg); height:200px;">

  <!-- Layout -->
  
  <div id="content">
    <div class="marginator">
                  <div class="columns main-columns">
        <h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Reading and Writing of the Honors Thesis</h1>                        <div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">
                                                  <div class="clear-block"> 
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>EAST 1930 S12 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 12670]</span></h3>


  	Prior admission to honors candidacy required. Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
					<dt>Course Attributes</dt>
						<dd>First Half of Year Course</dd>
			
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Harold+D+Roth">Harold D Roth</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

 </div>
                     </div>
        <!-- end .second-column -->

        <section id="banner" class="marginator sub-banner" style="background-image:url(/academics/east-asian-studies/sites/brown.edu.academics.east-asian-studies/files/ursa_minor_simple_banner_image.jpg); height:200px;">

  <!-- Layout -->
  
  <div id="content">
    <div class="marginator">
                  <div class="columns main-columns">
        <h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Reading and Writing of the Honors Thesis</h1>                        <div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">
                                                  <div class="clear-block"> 
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>EAST 1930 S13 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 12671]</span></h3>


  	Prior admission to honors candidacy required. Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
					<dt>Course Attributes</dt>
						<dd>First Half of Year Course</dd>
			
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Kerry+Smith">Kerry Smith</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

 </div>
                     </div>
        <!-- end .second-column -->
        
                <div id="sidebar-left" class="sidebar first-column column"> 
	
	<div id="block-menu-primary-links" class="clear-block block block-menu ">

        <section id="banner" class="marginator sub-banner" style="background-image:url(/academics/east-asian-studies/sites/brown.edu.academics.east-asian-studies/files/ursa_minor_simple_banner_image.jpg); height:200px;">

  <!-- Layout -->
  
  <div id="content">
    <div class="marginator">
                  <div class="columns main-columns">
        <h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Reading and Writing of the Honors Thesis</h1>                        <div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">
                                                  <div class="clear-block"> 
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>EAST 1930 S14 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 12672]</span></h3>


  	Prior admission to honors candidacy required. Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
					<dt>Course Attributes</dt>
						<dd>First Half of Year Course</dd>
			
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Zhuqing+Li">Zhuqing Li</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

 </div>
                     </div>
        <!-- end .second-column -->
        
                <div id="sidebar-left" class="sidebar first-column column">

  <!-- Layout -->
  
  <div id="content">
    <div class="marginator">
                  <div class="columns main-columns">
        <h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Reading and Writing of the Honors Thesis</h1>                        <div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">
                                                  <div class="clear-block"> 
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>EAST 1930 S15 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 12673]</span></h3>


  	Prior admission to honors candidacy required. Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
					<dt>Course Attributes</dt>
						<dd>First Half of Year Course</dd>
			
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Meera+S+Viswanathan">Meera S Viswanathan</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

 </div>
                     </div>
        <!-- end .second-column -->

        <section id="banner" class="marginator sub-banner" style="background-image:url(/academics/east-asian-studies/sites/brown.edu.academics.east-asian-studies/files/ursa_minor_simple_banner_image.jpg); height:200px;">

  <!-- Layout -->
  
  <div id="content">
    <div class="marginator">
                  <div class="columns main-columns">
        <h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Reading and Writing of the Honors Thesis</h1>                        <div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">
                                                  <div class="clear-block"> 
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>EAST 1930 S16 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 12674]</span></h3>


  	Prior admission to honors candidacy required. Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
					<dt>Course Attributes</dt>
						<dd>First Half of Year Course</dd>
			
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Lingzhen+Wang">Lingzhen Wang</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

 </div>
                     </div>
        <!-- end .second-column -->

                  <div class="columns main-columns">
        <h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Reading and Writing of the Honors Thesis</h1>                        <div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">
                                                  <div class="clear-block"> 
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>EAST 1930 S17 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 12675]</span></h3>


  	Prior admission to honors candidacy required. Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
					<dt>Course Attributes</dt>
						<dd>First Half of Year Course</dd>
			
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Kikuko+Yamashita">Kikuko Yamashita</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

 </div>
                     </div>

  <!-- Layout -->
  
  <div id="content">
    <div class="marginator">
                  <div class="columns main-columns">
        <h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Reading and Writing of the Honors Thesis</h1>                        <div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">
                                                  <div class="clear-block"> 
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>EAST 1930 S18 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 12676]</span></h3>


  	Prior admission to honors candidacy required. Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
					<dt>Course Attributes</dt>
						<dd>First Half of Year Course</dd>
			
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Rebecca+A+Nedostup">Rebecca A Nedostup</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

 </div>
                     </div>
        <!-- end .second-column -->

        <h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Senior Reading and Research: Selected Topics</h1>                        <div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">
                                                  <div class="clear-block"> 
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>EAST 1990 S01 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 12677]</span></h3>


  	Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


		

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>

        <h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Senior Reading and Research: Selected Topics</h1>                        <div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">
                                                  <div class="clear-block"> 
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>EAST 1990 S02 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 12678]</span></h3>


  	Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


		

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>

                  <div class="columns main-columns">
        <h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Senior Reading and Research: Selected Topics</h1>                        <div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">
                                                  <div class="clear-block"> 
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>EAST 1990 S04 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 12679]</span></h3>


  	Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


		

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

                  <div class="columns main-columns">
        <h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Senior Reading and Research: Selected Topics</h1>                        <div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">
                                                  <div class="clear-block"> 
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>EAST 1990 S05 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 12680]</span></h3>


  	Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Lingzhen+Wang">Lingzhen Wang</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

                  <div class="columns main-columns">
        <h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Senior Reading and Research: Selected Topics</h1>                        <div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">
                                                  <div class="clear-block"> 
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>EAST 1990 S06 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 12681]</span></h3>


  	Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Dore+J+Levy">Dore J Levy</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

  <div id="content">
    <div class="marginator">
                  <div class="columns main-columns">
        <h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Senior Reading and Research: Selected Topics</h1>                        <div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">
                                                  <div class="clear-block"> 
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>EAST 1990 S07 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 12682]</span></h3>


  	Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Robert+G+Lee">Robert G Lee</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

 </div>
                     </div>
        <!-- end .second-column -->

<li class="leaf last menu-alumninewsletters"><a href="http://www.brown.edu/academics/east-asian-studies/about/alumni-newsletters/alumni-newsletters" title="">Alumni Newsletters</a></li>
</ul></div>
			
				
	</div>


	
	<div id="helpful-links" class="clear-block block block-menu ">
	
	<h5>Helpful Links</h5>	
		<div class="content"><ul class="menu"><li class="leaf first menu-easvideolibrary"><a href="/academics/east-asian-studies/eas-video-library/eas-video-library" title="The East Asian Studies Department has over 200 videos and DVDs in Chinese, Japanese and Korean. ">EAS Video Library</a></li>

  <div id="content">

                  <div class="columns main-columns">
        <h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Senior Reading and Research: Selected Topics</h1>                        <div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">
                                                  <div class="clear-block"> 
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>EAST 1990 S08 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 12683]</span></h3>


  	Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=James+L+McClain">James L McClain</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

 </div>
                     </div>

  <div id="content">

                  <div class="columns main-columns">
        <h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Senior Reading and Research: Selected Topics</h1>                        <div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">
                                                  <div class="clear-block"> 
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>EAST 1990 S09 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 12684]</span></h3>


  	Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


		

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

 </div>
                     </div>

  <div class="marginator">
    <div id="brown-footer" class="clear-block block block-block ">
      <h4>Brown University</h4>
      <div class="content">
        <p><span class="city-state-country">Providence, Rhode Island 02912, USA</span><br />
          <span class="telephone">Phone: 401-863-1000</span><br />

  <div id="content">
    <div class="marginator">
                  <div class="columns main-columns">
        <h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Senior Reading and Research: Selected Topics</h1>                        <div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">
                                                  <div class="clear-block"> 
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>EAST 1990 S10 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 12685]</span></h3>


  	Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


		

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

 </div>
                     </div>

  <div id="content">
    <div class="marginator">
                  <div class="columns main-columns">
        <h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Senior Reading and Research: Selected Topics</h1>                        <div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">
                                                  <div class="clear-block"> 
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>EAST 1990 S11 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 12686]</span></h3>


  	Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Harold+D+Roth">Harold D Roth</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

 </div>
                     </div>
        <!-- end .second-column -->

		<div class="content"><div class="view view-contact-information view-id-contact_information view-display-id-block_1 view-dom-id-1">
    
  
  
      <div class="view-content">

  <!-- Layout -->
  
  <div id="content">
    <div class="marginator">
                  <div class="columns main-columns">
        <h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Senior Reading and Research: Selected Topics</h1>                        <div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">
                                                  <div class="clear-block"> 
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>EAST 1990 S12 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 12687]</span></h3>


  	Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Kerry+Smith">Kerry Smith</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

 </div>
                     </div>
        <!-- end .second-column -->
        
                <div id="sidebar-left" class="sidebar first-column column">

	</div>

        <section id="banner" class="marginator sub-banner" style="background-image:url(/academics/east-asian-studies/sites/brown.edu.academics.east-asian-studies/files/ursa_minor_simple_banner_image.jpg); height:200px;">

  <!-- Layout -->
  
  <div id="content">
    <div class="marginator">
                  <div class="columns main-columns">
        <h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Senior Reading and Research: Selected Topics</h1>                        <div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">
                                                  <div class="clear-block"> 
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>EAST 1990 S13 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 12688]</span></h3>


  	Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Meera+S+Viswanathan">Meera S Viswanathan</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

 </div>
                     </div>
        <!-- end .second-column -->
        
                <div id="sidebar-left" class="sidebar first-column column"> 
	
	<div id="block-menu-primary-links" class="clear-block block block-menu ">
	
		
		<div class="content"><ul class="menu"><li class="collapsed first menu-home"><a href="/academics/east-asian-studies/home/welcome" title="Home">Home</a></li>
<li class="collapsed menu-easscholarshipsandfellowships"><a href="/academics/east-asian-studies/work-and-funding-resources/eas-summer-awards" title="EAS Summer Awards">EAS Scholarships and Fellowships</a></li>
<li class="expanded active-trail menu-theconcentration"><a href="/academics/east-asian-studies/concentration" title="Undergraduate">The Concentration</a><ul class="menu"><li class="leaf first menu-whyeas"><a href="/academics/east-asian-studies/concentration/why-east-asian-studies" title="Why East Asian Studies?">Why EAS?</a></li>
<li class="leaf menu-requirements"><a href="/academics/east-asian-studies/concentration/requirements" title="Classes of 2013 and Later">Requirements</a></li>

        <section id="banner" class="marginator sub-banner" style="background-image:url(/academics/east-asian-studies/sites/brown.edu.academics.east-asian-studies/files/ursa_minor_simple_banner_image.jpg); height:200px;">

  <!-- Layout -->
  
  <div id="content">
    <div class="marginator">
                  <div class="columns main-columns">
        <h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Senior Reading and Research: Selected Topics</h1>                        <div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">
                                                  <div class="clear-block"> 
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>EAST 1990 S14 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 12689]</span></h3>


  	Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Hye-Sook+Wang">Hye-Sook Wang</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

 </div>
                     </div>
        <!-- end .second-column -->

                  <div class="columns main-columns">
        <h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Senior Reading and Research: Selected Topics</h1>                        <div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">
                                                  <div class="clear-block"> 
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>EAST 1990 S15 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 12690]</span></h3>


  	Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Lingzhen+Wang">Lingzhen Wang</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

 </div>

                  <div class="columns main-columns">
        <h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Senior Reading and Research: Selected Topics</h1>                        <div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">
                                                  <div class="clear-block"> 
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>EAST 1990 S16 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 12691]</span></h3>


  	Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Kikuko+Yamashita">Kikuko Yamashita</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

 </div>

<header id="header-region">
<section id="audience-gateways">
  <div class="marginator">
    <h6>Information For:</h6>
    <ul>
      <li id="gateway-current-students" class="first"><a href="/gateway/current-students">Current Students</a></li>
      <li id="gateway-faculty"><a href="/gateway/faculty">Faculty</a></li>
      <li id="gateway-staff"><a href="/gateway/staff">Staff</a></li>
      <li id="gateway-families"><a href="/gateway/families">Families</a></li>
      <li id="gateway-alumni"><a href="/gateway/alumni">Alumni</a></li>
      <li id="gateway-friends-and-neighbors" class="last"><a href="/gateway/friends-and-neighbors">Friends &amp; Neighbors</a></li>
    </ul>
  </div>
</section>

  <!-- Layout -->
  
  <div id="content">
    <div class="marginator">
                  <div class="columns main-columns">
        <h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Independent Study</h1>                        <div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">
                                                  <div class="clear-block"> 
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>JAPN 1910 S01 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13458]</span></h3>


  	Reading materials for research in Japanese. Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Yuko+I+Jackson">Yuko I Jackson</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

 </div>
                     </div>
        <!-- end .second-column -->

  <!-- Layout -->
  
  <div id="content">
    <div class="marginator">
                  <div class="columns main-columns">
        <h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Independent Study</h1>                        <div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">
                                                  <div class="clear-block"> 
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>JAPN 1910 S02 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13459]</span></h3>


  	Reading materials for research in Japanese. Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=James+L+McClain">James L McClain</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

 </div>
                     </div>
        <!-- end .second-column -->

                  <div class="columns main-columns">
        <h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Independent Study</h1>                        <div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">
                                                  <div class="clear-block"> 
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>JAPN 1910 S03 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13460]</span></h3>


  	Reading materials for research in Japanese. Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Hiroshi+Tajima">Hiroshi Tajima</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

 </div>
                     </div>
        <!-- end .second-column -->

  <div id="content">

                  <div class="columns main-columns">
        <h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Independent Study</h1>                        <div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">
                                                  <div class="clear-block"> 
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>JAPN 1910 S04 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13461]</span></h3>


  	Reading materials for research in Japanese. Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Kikuko+Yamashita">Kikuko Yamashita</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

 </div>
                     </div>
        <!-- end .second-column -->

  <div id="content">

                  <div class="columns main-columns">
        <h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Independent Study</h1>                        <div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">
                                                  <div class="clear-block"> 
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>KREA 1910 S01 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13471]</span></h3>


  	Reading materials for research in Korean. Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Hye-Sook+Wang">Hye-Sook Wang</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

 </div>
                     </div>
        <!-- end .second-column -->

  <div id="content">
    <div class="marginator">
                  <div class="columns main-columns">
        <h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Basic Chinese</h1>                        <div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">
                                                  <div class="clear-block"> 
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>CHIN 0100 S01 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 15218]</span></h3>


  	A year-long introduction to Standard Chinese (Mandarin). Speaking, reading, writing, and grammar. Five classroom meetings weekly. This is the first half of a year-long course whose first semester grade is normally a temporary one.  Neither semester may be elected independently without special written permission. The final grade submitted at the end of course work in CHIN 0200 covers the entire year and is recorded as the final grade for both semesters.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>18</dd>
		
					<dt>Course Attributes</dt>
						<dd>First Half of Year Course</dd>
			
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Wenhui+Chen">Wenhui Chen</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
					<dt>Meetings</dt>
														<dd>
						<div class="room"><a href="http://www.brown.edu/Facilities/Facilities_Management/maps/index.php?query=J. Walter Wilson">J. Walter Wilson</a> 303</div>
						<div class="times">09:00 - 09:50 Mon, Wed, Fri - from Sep 6, 2017 to Dec 21, 2017						</div>
						</dd>
											<dd>
						<div class="room"><a href="http://www.brown.edu/Facilities/Facilities_Management/maps/index.php?query=J. Walter Wilson">J. Walter Wilson</a> 303</div>
						<div class="times">09:00 - 10:20 Tue, Thu - from Sep 6, 2017 to Dec 21, 2017						</div>
						</dd>
												
		
		
		
					<dt>Exam Group Code</dt>
			<dd>15</dd>
		


		</dl>
  </div>

 </div>
                     </div>

		<div class="content"><ul class="menu"><li class="leaf first menu-easvideolibrary"><a href="/academics/east-asian-studies/eas-video-library/eas-video-library" title="The East Asian Studies Department has over 200 videos and DVDs in Chinese, Japanese and Korean. ">EAS Video Library</a></li>

<li class="leaf menu-rockefellerlibrary"><a href="http://library.brown.edu/" title="Brown University Library">Rockefeller Library</a></li>
<li class="leaf menu-watsoninstforinternationalstudies"><a href="http://www.watsoninstitute.org/" title="A research and teaching center which often sponsors lectures and other events related to East Asia.">Watson Inst. for International Studies</a></li>
<li class="leaf last menu-internationalprograms"><a href="http://www.brown.edu/Administration/OIP/" title="Assists students in finding Brown-approved summer, semester, or year-long study abroad in several East Asian countries.">International Programs</a></li>
</ul></div>
			
				
	</div>

 </div>
</footer>

  <!-- Layout -->
  
  <div id="content">
    <div class="marginator">
                  <div class="columns main-columns">
        <h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Basic Chinese</h1>                        <div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">
                                                  <div class="clear-block"> 
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>CHIN 0100 S02 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 15219]</span></h3>


  	A year-long introduction to Standard Chinese (Mandarin). Speaking, reading, writing, and grammar. Five classroom meetings weekly. This is the first half of a year-long course whose first semester grade is normally a temporary one.  Neither semester may be elected independently without special written permission. The final grade submitted at the end of course work in CHIN 0200 covers the entire year and is recorded as the final grade for both semesters.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>18</dd>
		
					<dt>Course Attributes</dt>
						<dd>First Half of Year Course</dd>
			
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Wenhui+Chen">Wenhui Chen</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
					<dt>Meetings</dt>
														<dd>
						<div class="room"><a href="http://www.brown.edu/Facilities/Facilities_Management/maps/index.php?query=J. Walter Wilson">J. Walter Wilson</a> 502</div>
						<div class="times">10:00 - 10:50 Mon, Wed, Fri - from Sep 6, 2017 to Dec 21, 2017						</div>
						</dd>
											<dd>
						<div class="room"><a href="http://www.brown.edu/Facilities/Facilities_Management/maps/index.php?query=J. Walter Wilson">J. Walter Wilson</a> 502</div>
						<div class="times">10:30 - 11:50 Tue, Thu - from Sep 6, 2017 to Dec 21, 2017						</div>
						</dd>
												
		
		
		
					<dt>Exam Group Code</dt>
			<dd>15</dd>
		


		</dl>
  </div>

 </div>
                     </div>
        <!-- end .second-column -->

        <section id="banner" class="marginator sub-banner" style="background-image:url(/academics/east-asian-studies/sites/brown.edu.academics.east-asian-studies/files/ursa_minor_simple_banner_image.jpg); height:200px;">

  <!-- Layout -->
  
  <div id="content">
    <div class="marginator">
                  <div class="columns main-columns">
        <h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Basic Chinese</h1>                        <div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">
                                                  <div class="clear-block"> 
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>CHIN 0100 S03 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 15220]</span></h3>


  	A year-long introduction to Standard Chinese (Mandarin). Speaking, reading, writing, and grammar. Five classroom meetings weekly. This is the first half of a year-long course whose first semester grade is normally a temporary one.  Neither semester may be elected independently without special written permission. The final grade submitted at the end of course work in CHIN 0200 covers the entire year and is recorded as the final grade for both semesters.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>18</dd>
		
					<dt>Course Attributes</dt>
						<dd>First Half of Year Course</dd>
			
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Wenhui+Chen">Wenhui Chen</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
					<dt>Meetings</dt>
														<dd>
						<div class="room"><a href="http://www.brown.edu/Facilities/Facilities_Management/maps/index.php?query=Sayles Hall">Sayles Hall</a> 306</div>
						<div class="times">13:00 - 13:50 Mon, Wed, Fri - from Sep 6, 2017 to Dec 21, 2017						</div>
						</dd>
											<dd>
						<div class="room"><a href="http://www.brown.edu/Facilities/Facilities_Management/maps/index.php?query=Sayles Hall">Sayles Hall</a> 306</div>
						<div class="times">13:00 - 14:20 Tue, Thu - from Sep 6, 2017 to Dec 21, 2017						</div>
						</dd>
												
		
		
		
					<dt>Exam Group Code</dt>
			<dd>15</dd>
		


		</dl>
  </div>

 </div>
                     </div>
        <!-- end .second-column -->

	<div class="tel"><span class="type">Fax</span> <span class="value">401 863 2659</span></div>
	<div><a class="email" href="mailto:EAS@brown.edu">EAS@brown.edu</a></div>
</div>
  </div>
    </div>
  
  
  
  
  
  
</div> </div>
			
				
	</div>

 </div>
              </div>
      <!-- end .columns -->

        <section id="banner" class="marginator sub-banner" style="background-image:url(/academics/east-asian-studies/sites/brown.edu.academics.east-asian-studies/files/ursa_minor_simple_banner_image.jpg); height:200px;">

  <!-- Layout -->
  
  <div id="content">
    <div class="marginator">
                  <div class="columns main-columns">
        <h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Basic Chinese</h1>                        <div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">
                                                  <div class="clear-block"> 
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>CHIN 0100 S04 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 15221]</span></h3>


  	A year-long introduction to Standard Chinese (Mandarin). Speaking, reading, writing, and grammar. Five classroom meetings weekly. This is the first half of a year-long course whose first semester grade is normally a temporary one.  Neither semester may be elected independently without special written permission. The final grade submitted at the end of course work in CHIN 0200 covers the entire year and is recorded as the final grade for both semesters.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>18</dd>
		
					<dt>Course Attributes</dt>
						<dd>First Half of Year Course</dd>
			
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Wenhui+Chen">Wenhui Chen</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
					<dt>Meetings</dt>
														<dd>
						<div class="room"><a href="http://www.brown.edu/Facilities/Facilities_Management/maps/index.php?query=Sayles Hall">Sayles Hall</a> 306</div>
						<div class="times">14:00 - 14:50 Mon, Wed, Fri - from Sep 6, 2017 to Dec 21, 2017						</div>
						</dd>
											<dd>
						<div class="room"><a href="http://www.brown.edu/Facilities/Facilities_Management/maps/index.php?query=Sayles Hall">Sayles Hall</a> 306</div>
						<div class="times">14:30 - 15:50 Tue, Thu - from Sep 6, 2017 to Dec 21, 2017						</div>
						</dd>
												
		
		
		
					<dt>Exam Group Code</dt>
			<dd>15</dd>
		


		</dl>
  </div>

 </div>
                     </div>
        <!-- end .second-column -->

	</div>

        <section id="banner" class="marginator sub-banner" style="background-image:url(/academics/east-asian-studies/sites/brown.edu.academics.east-asian-studies/files/ursa_minor_simple_banner_image.jpg); height:200px;">

  <!-- Layout -->
  
  <div id="content">
    <div class="marginator">
                  <div class="columns main-columns">
        <h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Intermediate Chinese</h1>                        <div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">
                                                  <div class="clear-block"> 
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>CHIN 0300 S01 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 15222]</span></h3>


  	An intermediate course in Standard Chinese designed to further communicative competence and to develop reading and writing skills. Five classroom meetings weekly. Prerequisite: CHIN 0200 or permission of instructor.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>18</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Jia-Lin+Huang+Hsieh">Jia-Lin Huang Hsieh</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
					<dt>Meetings</dt>
														<dd>
						<div class="room"><a href="http://www.brown.edu/Facilities/Facilities_Management/maps/index.php?query=Rockefeller Library">Rockefeller Library</a> 205</div>
						<div class="times">12:00 - 12:50 Mon, Wed, Fri - from Sep 6, 2017 to Dec 21, 2017						</div>
						</dd>
											<dd>
						<div class="room"><a href="http://www.brown.edu/Facilities/Facilities_Management/maps/index.php?query=Sayles Hall">Sayles Hall</a> 205</div>
						<div class="times">12:00 - 12:50 Tue, Thu - from Sep 6, 2017 to Dec 21, 2017						</div>
						</dd>
												
		
		
		
					<dt>Exam Group Code</dt>
			<dd>15</dd>
		


		</dl>
  </div>

 </div>
                     </div>
        <!-- end .second-column -->
        
                <div id="sidebar-left" class="sidebar first-column column"> 
	
	<div id="block-menu-primary-links" class="clear-block block block-menu ">

  <!-- Layout -->
  
  <div id="content">
    <div class="marginator">
                  <div class="columns main-columns">
        <h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Intermediate Chinese</h1>                        <div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">
                                                  <div class="clear-block"> 
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>CHIN 0300 S02 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 15223]</span></h3>


  	An intermediate course in Standard Chinese designed to further communicative competence and to develop reading and writing skills. Five classroom meetings weekly. Prerequisite: CHIN 0200 or permission of instructor.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>18</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Jia-Lin+Huang+Hsieh">Jia-Lin Huang Hsieh</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
					<dt>Meetings</dt>
														<dd>
						<div class="room"><a href="http://www.brown.edu/Facilities/Facilities_Management/maps/index.php?query=Rockefeller Library">Rockefeller Library</a> 205</div>
						<div class="times">13:00 - 13:50 Mon, Wed, Fri - from Sep 6, 2017 to Dec 21, 2017						</div>
						</dd>
											<dd>
						<div class="room"><a href="http://www.brown.edu/Facilities/Facilities_Management/maps/index.php?query=Sayles Hall">Sayles Hall</a> 205</div>
						<div class="times">13:00 - 14:20 Tue, Thu - from Sep 6, 2017 to Dec 21, 2017						</div>
						</dd>
												
		
		
		
					<dt>Exam Group Code</dt>
			<dd>15</dd>
		


		</dl>
  </div>

 </div>
                     </div>
        <!-- end .second-column -->

  <!-- Layout -->
  
  <div id="content">
    <div class="marginator">
                  <div class="columns main-columns">
        <h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Intermediate Chinese</h1>                        <div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">
                                                  <div class="clear-block"> 
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>CHIN 0300 S03 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 15224]</span></h3>


  	An intermediate course in Standard Chinese designed to further communicative competence and to develop reading and writing skills. Five classroom meetings weekly. Prerequisite: CHIN 0200 or permission of instructor.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>18</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Jia-Lin+Huang+Hsieh">Jia-Lin Huang Hsieh</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
					<dt>Meetings</dt>
														<dd>
						<div class="room"><a href="http://www.brown.edu/Facilities/Facilities_Management/maps/index.php?query=Rockefeller Library">Rockefeller Library</a> 205</div>
						<div class="times">14:00 - 14:50 Mon, Wed, Fri - from Sep 6, 2017 to Dec 21, 2017						</div>
						</dd>
											<dd>
						<div class="room"><a href="http://www.brown.edu/Facilities/Facilities_Management/maps/index.php?query=Sayles Hall">Sayles Hall</a> 205</div>
						<div class="times">14:30 - 15:50 Tue, Thu - from Sep 6, 2017 to Dec 21, 2017						</div>
						</dd>
												
		
		
		
					<dt>Exam Group Code</dt>
			<dd>15</dd>
		


		</dl>
  </div>

 </div>
                     </div>
        <!-- end .second-column -->

<header id="header-region">
<section id="audience-gateways">
  <div class="marginator">
    <h6>Information For:</h6>
    <ul>
      <li id="gateway-current-students" class="first"><a href="/gateway/current-students">Current Students</a></li>
      <li id="gateway-faculty"><a href="/gateway/faculty">Faculty</a></li>
      <li id="gateway-staff"><a href="/gateway/staff">Staff</a></li>
      <li id="gateway-families"><a href="/gateway/families">Families</a></li>

</section>

        <section id="banner" class="marginator sub-banner" style="background-image:url(/academics/east-asian-studies/sites/brown.edu.academics.east-asian-studies/files/ursa_minor_simple_banner_image.jpg); height:200px;">

  <!-- Layout -->
  
  <div id="content">
    <div class="marginator">
                  <div class="columns main-columns">
        <h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Advanced Modern Chinese II</h1>                        <div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">
                                                  <div class="clear-block"> 
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>CHIN 0700 S01 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 15226]</span></h3>


  	This course is designed to enhance the Chinese proficiency of those who have taken Advanced Modern Chinese I (CHIN 0600) or the equivalent. All four language skills are emphasized through selected authentic materials. At the end of the year, students should be able to express their ideas with sophistication and nuance. Drills on complex sentence patterns will be conducted when necessary. Prerequisite: CHIN 0600 or permission of instructor.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Lung-Hua+Hu">Lung-Hua Hu</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
					<dt>Meetings</dt>
														<dd>
						<div class="room"><a href="http://www.brown.edu/Facilities/Facilities_Management/maps/index.php?query=195 Angell Street">195 Angell Street</a> 202</div>
						<div class="times">10:00 - 10:50 Mon, Wed, Fri - from Sep 6, 2017 to Dec 21, 2017						</div>
						</dd>
											<dd>
						<div class="room"><a href="http://www.brown.edu/Facilities/Facilities_Management/maps/index.php?query=195 Angell Street">195 Angell Street</a> 202</div>
						<div class="times">10:30 - 11:50 Tue, Thu - from Sep 6, 2017 to Dec 21, 2017						</div>
						</dd>
												
		
		
		
					<dt>Exam Group Code</dt>
			<dd>14</dd>
		


		</dl>
  </div>

 </div>
                     </div>
        <!-- end .second-column -->

                  <div class="columns main-columns">
        <h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Basic Japanese</h1>                        <div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">
                                                  <div class="clear-block"> 
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>JAPN 0100 S01 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 15227]</span></h3>


  	Introduction to Japanese language. Emphasizes the attainment of good spoken control of Japanese and develops a foundation of literacy. No prerequisites. This is the first half of a year-long course whose first semester grade is normally a temporary one. Neither semester may be elected independently without special written permission. The final grade submitted at the end of the course work in JAPN 0200 covers the entire year and is recorded as the final grade for both semesters. The East Asian Studies department wishes to provide language instruction to all interested students. If you are unable to register for this course due to enrollment limits but are dedicated to learning Japanese, please contact the instructor via email.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>18</dd>
		
					<dt>Course Attributes</dt>
						<dd>First Half of Year Course</dd>
			
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Yuko+I+Jackson">Yuko I Jackson</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
					<dt>Meetings</dt>
														<dd>
						<div class="room"><a href="http://www.brown.edu/Facilities/Facilities_Management/maps/index.php?query=111 Thayer St-Watson Institute">111 Thayer St-Watson Institute</a> 116</div>
						<div class="times">09:00 - 09:50 Mon, Wed, Fri - from Sep 6, 2017 to Dec 21, 2017						</div>
						</dd>
											<dd>
						<div class="room"><a href="http://www.brown.edu/Facilities/Facilities_Management/maps/index.php?query=111 Thayer St-Watson Institute">111 Thayer St-Watson Institute</a> 116</div>
						<div class="times">09:00 - 10:20 Tue, Thu - from Sep 6, 2017 to Dec 21, 2017						</div>
						</dd>
												
		
		
		
					<dt>Exam Group Code</dt>
			<dd>04</dd>
		


		</dl>
  </div>

                  <div class="columns main-columns">
        <h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Basic Japanese</h1>                        <div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">
                                                  <div class="clear-block"> 
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>JAPN 0100 S02 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 15228]</span></h3>


  	Introduction to Japanese language. Emphasizes the attainment of good spoken control of Japanese and develops a foundation of literacy. No prerequisites. This is the first half of a year-long course whose first semester grade is normally a temporary one. Neither semester may be elected independently without special written permission. The final grade submitted at the end of the course work in JAPN 0200 covers the entire year and is recorded as the final grade for both semesters. The East Asian Studies department wishes to provide language instruction to all interested students. If you are unable to register for this course due to enrollment limits but are dedicated to learning Japanese, please contact the instructor via email.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>18</dd>
		
					<dt>Course Attributes</dt>
						<dd>First Half of Year Course</dd>
			
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Yuko+I+Jackson">Yuko I Jackson</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
					<dt>Meetings</dt>
														<dd>
						<div class="room"><a href="http://www.brown.edu/Facilities/Facilities_Management/maps/index.php?query=111 Thayer St-Watson Institute">111 Thayer St-Watson Institute</a> 116</div>
						<div class="times">10:00 - 10:50 Mon, Wed, Fri - from Sep 6, 2017 to Dec 21, 2017						</div>
						</dd>
											<dd>
						<div class="room"><a href="http://www.brown.edu/Facilities/Facilities_Management/maps/index.php?query=111 Thayer St-Watson Institute">111 Thayer St-Watson Institute</a> 116</div>
						<div class="times">10:30 - 11:50 Tue, Thu - from Sep 6, 2017 to Dec 21, 2017						</div>
						</dd>
												
		
		
		
					<dt>Exam Group Code</dt>
			<dd>04</dd>
		


		</dl>
  </div>

  <div id="content">

                  <div class="columns main-columns">
        <h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Basic Japanese</h1>                        <div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">
                                                  <div class="clear-block"> 
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>JAPN 0100 S03 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 15229]</span></h3>


  	Introduction to Japanese language. Emphasizes the attainment of good spoken control of Japanese and develops a foundation of literacy. No prerequisites. This is the first half of a year-long course whose first semester grade is normally a temporary one. Neither semester may be elected independently without special written permission. The final grade submitted at the end of the course work in JAPN 0200 covers the entire year and is recorded as the final grade for both semesters. The East Asian Studies department wishes to provide language instruction to all interested students. If you are unable to register for this course due to enrollment limits but are dedicated to learning Japanese, please contact the instructor via email.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>18</dd>
		
					<dt>Course Attributes</dt>
						<dd>First Half of Year Course</dd>
			
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Yuko+I+Jackson">Yuko I Jackson</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
					<dt>Meetings</dt>
														<dd>
						<div class="room"><a href="http://www.brown.edu/Facilities/Facilities_Management/maps/index.php?query=111 Thayer St-Watson Institute">111 Thayer St-Watson Institute</a> 114</div>
						<div class="times">13:00 - 13:50 Mon, Wed, Fri - from Sep 6, 2017 to Dec 21, 2017						</div>
						</dd>
											<dd>
						<div class="room"><a href="http://www.brown.edu/Facilities/Facilities_Management/maps/index.php?query=111 Thayer St-Watson Institute">111 Thayer St-Watson Institute</a> 114</div>
						<div class="times">13:00 - 14:20 Tue, Thu - from Sep 6, 2017 to Dec 21, 2017						</div>
						</dd>
												
		
		
		
					<dt>Exam Group Code</dt>
			<dd>04</dd>
		


		</dl>
  </div>

  <!-- Layout -->
  
  <div id="content">
    <div class="marginator">
                  <div class="columns main-columns">
        <h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Intermediate Japanese</h1>                        <div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">
                                                  <div class="clear-block"> 
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>JAPN 0300 S01 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 15231]</span></h3>


  	Further practice of patterns and structures of the language. Readings are introduced on aspects of Japanese culture and society to develop reading and writing skills, enhance vocabulary, and provide points of departure for conversation in Japanese. Prerequisite: JAPN 0200 or equivalent. The East Asian Studies department wishes to provide language instruction to all interested students. If you are unable to register for this course due to enrollment limits but are dedicated to learning Japanese, please contact the instructor via email.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>18</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Hiroshi+Tajima">Hiroshi Tajima</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
					<dt>Meetings</dt>
														<dd>
						<div class="room"><a href="http://www.brown.edu/Facilities/Facilities_Management/maps/index.php?query=111 Thayer St-Watson Institute">111 Thayer St-Watson Institute</a> 116</div>
						<div class="times">11:00 - 11:50 Mon, Wed, Fri - from Sep 6, 2017 to Dec 21, 2017						</div>
						</dd>
											<dd>
						<div class="room"><a href="http://www.brown.edu/Facilities/Facilities_Management/maps/index.php?query=111 Thayer St-Watson Institute">111 Thayer St-Watson Institute</a> 112</div>
						<div class="times">14:30 - 15:50 Tue, Thu - from Sep 6, 2017 to Dec 21, 2017						</div>
						</dd>
												
		
		
		
					<dt>Exam Group Code</dt>
			<dd>04</dd>
		


		</dl>
  </div>

 </div>
                     </div>
        <!-- end .second-column -->

        </ul>
      </div>
    </div>
    
	
	<div id="students--amp--alumni" class="clear-block block block-menu ">
