  <div id="content">
    <div class="marginator">
                  <div class="columns main-columns">
        <h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Courses for Fall 2017</h1>                        <div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">
                              <div id="tabs-wrapper" class="clear-block">
            <ul class="tabs primary">
              <li ><a href="/academics/east-asian-studies/courses/chin">CHIN</a></li>
<li ><a href="/academics/east-asian-studies/courses/east">EAST</a></li>
<li ><a href="/academics/east-asian-studies/courses/japn">JAPN</a></li>
<li class="active" ><a href="/academics/east-asian-studies/courses/krea" class="active">KREA</a></li>

            </ul>
          </div>
                                        <div class="clear-block"> <div class="content">



		<div class="course-section" id="krea">
			
				<ul class="course-list">
										<li id="KREA0100">
					<h4>Korean</h4>
					<div class="course-overview">Begins with an introduction to the Korean writing system (Hangul) and focuses on building communicative competence in modern Korean in the four language modalities (listening, speaking, reading, writing). Provides a foundation for later work in spoken and written Korean. Six classroom hours per week. No prerequisite. Enrollment limited to 18. This is the first half of a year-long course whose first semester grade is normally a temporary one. Neither semester may be elected independently without special written permission. The final grade submitted at the end of the course work in KREA 0200 covers the entire year and is recorded as the final grade for both semesters. </div>
		
					<div class="sections">
								
												
												<div class="section first-section">
												
							<h5><a href="/academics/east-asian-studies/courses/detail?term=201710&crn=15235">KREA 0100 S01</a></h5>
														<dl>
																<dt>Primary Instructor</dt><dd>Ha</dd>
																							</dl>
						</div>
						
																				<div class="additional-sections">
															
																		
												<div class="section">
												
							<h5><a href="/academics/east-asian-studies/courses/detail?term=201710&crn=15236">KREA 0100 S02</a></h5>
														<dl>
																<dt>Primary Instructor</dt><dd>Ha</dd>
																							</dl>
						</div>
						
														
																										</div>
												</div>
						
				</li>
										<li id="KREA0300">
					<h4>Intermediate Korean</h4>
					<div class="course-overview">An intermediate course in Korean designed to further communicative competence in spoken Korean and to provide additional reading practice in stylistically higher level materials that are progressively integrated into the given dialogues. Discussions on various aspects of Korean culture and society. Five classroom hours per week. Prerequisite: KREA 0200 or instructor permission. </div>
		
					<div class="sections">
								
												
												<div class="section first-section">
												
							<h5><a href="/academics/east-asian-studies/courses/detail?term=201710&crn=15237">KREA 0300 S01</a></h5>
														<dl>
																<dt>Primary Instructor</dt><dd>Ha</dd>
																							</dl>
						</div>
						
																					
																								</div>
						
				</li>
										<li id="KREA0500">
					<h4>Advanced Korean</h4>
					<div class="course-overview">Aims to help students develop an advanced level of communicative competence, with special focus on enhancing their reading comprehension, essay writing, and discourse (discussion  and presentation) skills.  Authentic reading materials from a variety of sources will be used to introduce various topics and issues pertaining to Korean society and culture, thus students' cultural understanding will also be enhanced.  Prerequisite:  KREA 0400 or equivalent or permission of instructor. </div>
		
					<div class="sections">
								
												
												<div class="section first-section">
												
							<h5><a href="/academics/east-asian-studies/courses/detail?term=201710&crn=15238">KREA 0500 S01</a></h5>
														<dl>
																<dt>Primary Instructor</dt><dd>Park</dd>
																							</dl>
						</div>
						
																					
																								</div>
						
				</li>
										<li id="KREA0910B">
					<h4>Media Korean</h4>
					<div class="course-overview">Develop linguistic competence and deepen cultural understanding through exposure to a variety of media sources.  Built on the Content-based Instruction model and Genre-based Approach.  Discuss current Korean affairs and core issues of culture based on assigned materials. Develop reading and listening comprehension skills through pre-class activities, oral proficiency through in-class discussion and presentation, and writing proficiency through assigned essays writings, in addition to various integrative tasks.  Tuesday classes will focus on comprehending the text and source materials, Thursday classes will focus on related tasks and activities. Enrollment limited to 20. Conducted entirely in Korean. </div>
		
					<div class="sections">
								
												
												<div class="section first-section">
												
							<h5><a href="/academics/east-asian-studies/courses/detail?term=201710&crn=15244">KREA 0910B S01</a></h5>
														<dl>
																<dt>Primary Instructor</dt><dd>Wang</dd>
																							</dl>
						</div>
						
																					
																								</div>
						
				</li>
										<li id="KREA1910">
					<h4>Independent Study</h4>
					<div class="course-overview">Reading materials for research in Korean. Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course. </div>
		
					<div class="sections">
								
												
												<div class="section first-section">
												
							<h5><a href="/academics/east-asian-studies/courses/detail?term=201710&crn=13471">KREA 1910 S01</a></h5>
														<dl>
																<dt>Primary Instructor</dt><dd>Wang</dd>
																								<dt>Schedule Code</dt><dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
															</dl>
						</div>
						
																					
																								</div>
						
				</li>
					</ul>
		
	</div> <!-- end .course-section -->



</div>



<script type="text/javascript">
	// @todo: make show/hide link dynamically generated
	$(document).ready(function(){
	
		$(".course-list .additional-sections").hide();

		// add additional sections toggle link
		$(".course-list .additional-sections").each(function(i,el){
			var numSections = $(".section", $(this)).length;
			numSections = (numSections == 1) ? numSections + " additional section" : numSections + " additional sections";
			var anchor = $(this).parents("li").attr('id');
			$(this).after('<span class="section-count">[<a href="#' + anchor + '">Show ' + numSections + '</a>]</span>');
		});

		// now add the show/hide event listeners		
		$(".section-count").each(function(i,el){
			$("a", this).bind("click keypress", function(){
				$(".additional-sections", $(this).parents("li")).slideToggle("fast");
				window.location.hash = $(this).attr("href");
				if($(this).html().match(/Show/)) {
					$(this).html($(this).html().replace("Show", "Hide"));
				} else if($(this).html().match(/Hide/)) {
					$(this).html($(this).html().replace("Hide", "Show"));
				}
				this.text(($('#toggle').text() == 'Show more') ? 'Show less' : 'Show more');
				return false;
			});
		});
		
		if (window.location.hash) {
			var hash = window.location.hash;
			if(hash.match(/#[0-9]{4}/)) {
				$(hash +  " .additional-sections").slideDown("fast");
				$(hash +  " a[href='"+hash+"']").html($(hash +  " a[href='"+hash+"']").html().replace("Show", "Hide"));
			}
		}

	});
</script>
 </div>
                     </div>

  <div id="content">

                  <div class="columns main-columns">
        <h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">More Course Offerings</h1>                        <div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">
                                                  <div class="clear-block"> 
<article id="node-4" class="main-article node">








  <div class="content">
        <h3>East Asia-Related Courses</h3>
<p><span>Please </span><span><a href="https://www.brown.edu/academics/east-asian-studies/sites/brown.edu.academics.east-asian-studies/files/uploads/Fall%2017%20Courses%20for%20EAS%20Credit.pdf">view or download</a> current&nbsp;</span><span>and </span><a href="http://brown.edu/academics/east-asian-studies/sites/brown.edu.academics.east-asian-studies/files/uploads/coursesforcredit_all_3.pdf">past University courses of interest to East Asian Studies concentrators</a>&nbsp;(seminars are marked with a check)<span>. **COURSE LISTINGS ARE SUBJECT TO CHANGE UP UNTIL THE REGISTRATION PERIOD. See <a href="https://cab.brown.edu/">Brown CAB</a> for current course information.</span></p>
<p><span>Please visit </span><a href="https://selfservice.brown.edu/ss/twbkwbis.P_GenMenu?name=homepage" target="_blank">Brown's online course catalog</a><span> for a complete archive of all classes offered. Concentrators should confirm with the <a href="mailto:jessica_cho@brown.edu" rel="nofollow">Program Coordinator&nbsp;</a></span><span>whether a particular East Asia-related course is eligible for concentration credit. Please contact <a href="mailto:eas@brown.edu" rel="nofollow">EAS@brown.edu</a> if you are interested in an East Asian course that is not see listed here.&nbsp;</span></p>
<fieldset class="fieldgroup group-related-files"><legend>Related Files</legend><div class="field field-type-filefield field-field-related-files">
    <div class="field-items">
            <div class="field-item odd">
                    <div class="filefield-file"><img class="filefield-icon field-icon-application-pdf"  alt="application/pdf icon" src="https://www.brown.edu/academics/east-asian-studies/sites/all/modules/filefield/icons/application-pdf.png" /><a href="https://www.brown.edu/academics/east-asian-studies/sites/brown.edu.academics.east-asian-studies/files/uploads/Pre-Approved%20Advanced%20Seminar%20List%20%28Fall%202017%29.pdf" type="application/pdf; length=22956">Pre-Approved Advanced Seminar List (Fall 2017).pdf</a></div>        </div>
              <div class="field-item even">
                    <div class="filefield-file"><img class="filefield-icon field-icon-application-pdf"  alt="application/pdf icon" src="https://www.brown.edu/academics/east-asian-studies/sites/all/modules/filefield/icons/application-pdf.png" /><a href="https://www.brown.edu/academics/east-asian-studies/sites/brown.edu.academics.east-asian-studies/files/uploads/Fall%2017%20Courses%20for%20EAS%20Credit.pdf" type="application/pdf; length=32420">Fall 17 Courses for EAS Credit.pdf</a></div>        </div>
        </div>
</div>
</fieldset>
  </div>

	



  <div class="clear-block">
    <div class="meta">

			
	    
		</div><!-- end .meta -->
	</div>

</article>

  <div id="content">

                  <div class="columns main-columns">
        <h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Content Courses, Spring 2017</h1>                        <div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">
                                                  <div class="clear-block"> 

<article class="content news_story clear-block main-article">

<div class="p details">
    <span class="date">January 24, 2017</span>
</div>









	<div class="body">
		<p><span class="thumbnail-wrapper inline inline-center" style="width:518px;"><img src="https://www.brown.edu/academics/east-asian-studies/sites/brown.edu.academics.east-asian-studies/files/images/EAS BDH POST SPRING 2017 (Website)2_0.jpg" alt="Content Courses, Spring 2017" title="Content Courses, Spring 2017"  class="image image-_original " width="510" height="383" /><span class="caption"><strong>Content Courses, Spring 2017</strong></span></span></p>
<div class="image-clear"></div>	</div>

	




</article>
 </div>

	<div class="tel"><span class="type">Phone</span> <span class="value">401 863 2778</span></div>
